thumb.title: 【VRゲーム実況】切り抜き動画まとめ【Vtuberみゃー】
thumb.description: VRゲームを実況しているVtuberみゃーです！この動画は、過去に耐久配信の休憩中に流した動画となっています。毎日21時からニコニコ動画とYoutubeで同時配信中Youtube：https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCO82mqyfgAglfWWTcksZ7hw?view_as=subscriberX：https://x.com/vr_mya_この動画に出てくるVRゲームBudget Cuts https://store.steampowered.com/app/400940/Budget_Cuts/Last Labyrinth https://store.steampowered.com/app/979400/Last_Labyrinth/Just In Time Incorporated https://store.steampowered.com/app/592030/Just_In_Time_Incorporated/TOKYO CHRONOS https://store.steampowered.com/app/1031440/TOKYO_CHRONOS/Borderlands 2 VR https://store.steampowered.com/app/991260/Borderlands_2_VR/The Wizards - Enhanced Edition https://store.steampowered.com/app/586950/The_Wizards__Enhanced_Edition/Fallout 4 VR https://store.steampowered.com/app/611660/Fallout_4_VR/Groove Fit Kingdom! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1358860/Groove_Fit_Kingdom/Arizona Sunshine® https://store.steampowered.com/app/342180/Arizona_Sunshine/Medal of Honor™: Above and Beyond https://store.steampowered.com/app/1402320/Medal_of_Honor_Above_and_Beyond/L.A. Noire: The VR Case Files https://store.steampowered.com/app/722230/LA_Noire_The_VR_Case_Files/
thumb.last_res_body: は、はかせーーー... うぽつ！
